markdownContent:
«Thank you so much! This looks great, right? Seems to me that you have a good eye, I wouldn't have noticed half of the things. I guess if you study history you really do learn how to have a good look at sources.

I talked to Laura a few minutes ago, she wants you to help Timea, the curator, for a bit. You'll find her on the first floor in one of the historical rooms. Thank you so much again for you help!»
